channel.title: Taiwan on Wind&Bones
channel.description: Recent content in Taiwan on Wind&Bones

item.title: Wind&Bones in Taiwan
item.description: This August, we’ll be packing our bags, and heading over to Taiwan. We were last in Taiwan four years ago, on a short visit from Myanmar, and we found ourselves smitten. In particular, while in Tainan (our favourite Taiwanese city),Â we visited the National Museum of Taiwan Literature, and we were enormously impressed by the nuanced and thoughtful take on the ways in which literature can act as a driver of positive social change.
